Step 1.Planning: Take the bell pepper out of the electric refrigerator

Step 2.Planning: Place the bell pepper on the chopping board

Step 3.Planning: Cut the bell pepper with the carving knife

Step 4.Planning: Heat the frying pan on the stove

Step 5.Planning: Put the chopped bell pepper into the frying pan

Step 6.Planning: Cook the bell pepper in the frying pan

Step 7.Planning: Serve the cooked bell pepper on a plate
